### Invitation to Tender: HVAC Assessment Study

#### Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), invites tenders for the provision of an HVAC Assessment Study for its 4 institutions and 3 Community Correctional Centers (CCC) in the Atlantic region.

#### Project Overview

The objective of this project is to assess and evaluate the heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems at applicant institutions to ensure they meet the required standards for correctional facilities. The study will assess the performance, efficiency, and capacity of the existing HVAC systems to determine any gaps or needed improvements.

#### Call for Tender

This is an invitation to tender on a sole-source basis, targeting firms that have previously demonstrated expertise in mechanical engineering services for CSC institutions in Atlantic Canada. The shortlisted firms, to be selected through an initial evaluation of their qualifications, may bid on this RFP.

#### Requirements

Parties interested and qualified to bid should submit their proposal in accordance with the PSPC's requirements by the closing date of April 16, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The selected bidder will be required to demonstrate the ability to meet the project's specific requirements.
